title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct research and gather input from stakeholders to understand the needs of different generational groups in the workplace.

title: Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for CrossGenerationalMentorMatcher, including web application, database, and any necessary integrations with existing systems or third-party services (e.g., authentication, messaging, notifications). This includes user management, profile management, matching algorithm, communication channels, reporting and analytics, and administration tools. Consider scalability, security, and performance in the design.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user profiles, mentorship relationships, and other relevant data.

title: User Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms, including user registration, login, and role-based access control.

title: Mentorship Matching Algorithm
description: Develop the core algorithm for matching mentors and mentees based on various criteria, such as skills, interests, goals, and generational differences.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the web application, including pages for user profiles, mentorship matching, communication, and progress tracking.

title: Communication and Collaboration Features
description: Implement features for mentors and mentees to communicate, share resources, and collaborate effectively, such as messaging, video conferencing, and file sharing.

title: Progress Tracking and Reporting
description: Develop mechanisms for tracking the progress of mentorship relationships and generating reports or analytics for program evaluation and improvement.

title: Security and Data Privacy
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with relevant data privacy regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans to ensure the application meets functional and non-functional requirements, including usability, performance, and accessibility.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment, configure continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and automate the deployment process.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for users, administrators, and developers, including user guides, technical documentation, and support resources.
